verses.roman:
keha tāṅre bale yadi kṛṣṇa-varaṇa
āra viśeṣaṇe tāra kare nivāraṇa

synonyms: keha—someone; tāṅre—to Him; bale—ascribes; yadi—if; kṛṣṇa—black; varaṇa—the color; āra—another; viśeṣaṇe—in the adjective; tāra—of that; kare—does; nivāraṇa—prevention.
translation: If someone tries to describe Him as being of blackish complexion, the next adjective [tviṣā akṛṣṇam] immediately restricts him.
